query:
ALTER TABLE student_exercise_answers 
ADD COLUMN aiScore INT,
ADD COLUMN aiConfidence INT,
ADD COLUMN aiAnalysis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN needsReview BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN reviewedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN reviewedAt TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN finalScore INT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute ALTER TABLE student_exercise_answers 
ADD COLUMN aiScore INT,
ADD COLUMN aiConfidence INT,
ADD COLUMN aiAnalysis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN needsReview BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN reviewedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN reviewedAt TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN finalScore INT;
